Episodes.description: In "The Ned Zone," Ned gets the ability to tell people's deaths just by touching someone. In "In the Belly of the Boss," Mr. Burns accidentally swallows Maggie and the Simpsons try to get her out. In "Four Beheadings and a Funeral," Lisa and Bart try to solve the mystery of the mutton-chops murderer.
Episodes.title: Treehouse of Horror XV

Episodes.description: Homer buys Marge a new kitchen, and Marge likes cooking in the new kitchen so much she attends the Ovenfresh Bakeoff.
Episodes.title: All's Fair in Oven War

Episodes.description: Because she thinks her own children do not appreciate her anymore, Marge becomes a mother figure for Nelson.
Episodes.title: Sleeping with the Enemy

Episodes.description: Marge's old high school friend, the famous reporter Chloe Talbot, comes to Springfield, and Marge becomes jealous when Lisa begins idolizing Chloe.
Episodes.title: She Used to Be My Girl

Episodes.description: Bart begins designing T-shirt slogans, and his T-shirts become very popular among the citizens of Springfield.
Episodes.title: Fat Man and Little Boy

Episodes.description: Homer goes to Canada with Apu and Ned to purchase Grampa's medication, but the three have problems getting home because the border guard thinks Apu is a terrorist.
Episodes.title: Midnight Rx

Episodes.description: Homer gives Moe an enormous amount of money so he doesn't have to close down.
Episodes.title: Mommie Beerest

Episodes.description: A video of Homer dancing becomes so popular that all major sports players hires Homer to design celebration dances for them.
Episodes.title: Homer and Ned's Hail Mary Pass

Episodes.description: Bart went to a rap concert Marge told him not to go to. In order to avoid punishment from Marge, he makes Marge and Homer believe he has been kidnapped.
Episodes.title: Pranksta Rap

Episodes.description: To gain new tourism dollars after a nationwide "Worst City" news report, Springfield legalizes gay marriage. Homer flips on the issue and sees money can be made marrying gay couples when Reverend Lovejoy refuses to do so. Come to find out, a family member is gay and wants Homer to perform the marriage.
Episodes.title: There's Something About Marrying

Episodes.description: After bullying her, Bart is restricted by court order to come too close to Lisa.
Episodes.title: On a Clear Day I Can't See My Sister

Episodes.description: lma decides to adopt a child, so the whole family goes to China.
Episodes.title: Goo Goo Gai Pan

Episodes.description: After a garage-cleaning accident, Marge wants Homer to get life insurance. Instead, the family gets an RV.
Episodes.title: Mobile Homer

Episodes.description: ringfield builds an opera house, but since no-one attends it they convert it into a prison. Old and forgotten laws are used to fill the prison, and therefore Homer goes to jail for kicking a can five times in a row. In jail, Homer becomes a snitch
Episodes.title: The Seven-Beer Snitch

Episodes.description: Bart and Lisa see into the future where their lives have changed.
Episodes.title: Future-Drama

Episodes.description: Homer meets a new friend, Ray the Roofer, but gets confined to a mental institution when his friends and family think he made him up.
Episodes.title: Don't Fear the Roofer

Episodes.description: Bart starts living on food from the new candy machine in school only, but he becomes so overweight that he has to go to a fat camp.
Episodes.title: The Heartbroke Kid

Episodes.description: Lisa attends a singing competition for children, and Homer becomes her manager because of his skill to write songs that the crowd loves.
Episodes.title: A Star is Torn

Episodes.description: Homer hears about the Rapture, and by using numerology to calculate when the Rapture is coming he learns that it is only one week away.
Episodes.title: Thank God It's Doomsday

Episodes.description: After Homer humiliates Ned Flanders, Ned, Rod, and Todd decides to leave Springfield and live in Humbleton, Pennsylvania.
Episodes.title: Home Away from Homer

Episodes.description: Bart is expelled from Springfield Elementary, and Bart is therefore enrolled in St. Jerome's Catholic School.
Episodes.title: The Father, the Son and the Holy Guest Star
